column4: ok, i really need wireless router tips. i have ndiswrapper installed w/ a driver for my card on it and it still wont work
got any wireless router tips? anyone....
what are you trying to accomplish?
get my wifi working
on your linux box?
yes
if you find anything, let me know.  i am struggling with the same issue.  :)
haha, thanks for the help ;)
i thought you might want tips about securing your wifi, or the such
you have ndiswrapper and a driver installed?
yeah.  i have a broadcom driver-based card
no, i just need to get it working
same here
me too
is it a linksys?
i know they reverse engineered a broadcom driver for linux and have it working
you just have to get the latest kernel sources and compile it into the kernel (pain in the butt)
yeah i saw that website but i didnt know what the heck they were talking about since i just switched from xp a couple days ago
i have a driver installed on ndiswrapper and all my settings configured bu it still doesnt work
do you get an error?
no, it doesnt connect at all
